thread.section_title: Park International Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location!
thread.title_full: Excellent location! - Review of Park International Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: beachgirl96
title: Excellent location!
text:
Park International is an excellent value for the price. It is within walking distance of the tube, Kensington Gardens, the Natural History Museum, the Victoria and Albert Museum, and Harrod's.
The room was cosy and comfortable. It was equipped with a refrigerator, which was nice, however it did not stay powered when the room card was removed from the wall. This rendered it useless.
The staff was pleasant, and tried to be helpful, but didn't follow through. Breakfast was included with my room. On the first morning, I asked if they had soya milk. They did not, but the woman I spoke with said they would have some for the rest of my stay. Each of the next two mornings, they did not have any. It wasn't a huge problem, but it did make me wonder if I had had a more pressing issue, how would it have been handled?
The hotel is well built. The building across the street was under construction, but the noise was not a disruption at all.
I would definitely return!
